BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THE UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA'S COLLEGE AT

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE PURPOSE OF THE UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA'S COLLEGE AT WISE FOUNDATION, INC. IS TO AID AND SUPPORT THE ACADEMIC, ATHLETIC AND STUDENT LIFE PROGRAMS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA'S COLLEGE AT WISE BY SOLICITING AND OBTAINING FUNDS FOR THE FURTHERANCE OF THOSE PROGRAMS. THE FOUNDATION ALSO SOLICITS AND RAISES FUNDS FOR THE PURCHASE AND MANAGEMENT OF PROPERTY, IMPROVED OR UNIMPROVED, EXCLUSIVELY FOR THE EDUCATIONAL BENEFIT OF THE UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA'S COLLEGE AT WISE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE PURPOSE OF THE UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA'S COLLEGE AT WISE FOUNDATION, INC. IS TO AID AND SUPPORT THE ACADEMIC, ATHLETIC AND STUDENT LIFE PROGRAMS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA'S COLLEGE AT WISE BY SOLICITING AND OBTAINING FUNDS FOR THE FURTHERANCE OF THOSE PROGRAMS. THE FOUNDATION ALSO SOLICITS AND RAISES FUNDS FOR THE PURCHASE AND MANAGEMENT OF PROPERTY, IMPROVED OR UNIMPROVED, EXCLUSIVELY FOR THE EDUCATIONAL BENEFIT OF THE UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA'S COLLEGE AT WISE.
IRS990.Desc: DURING THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2018, THE UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA'S COLLEGE AT WISE FOUNDATION, INC. PROVIDED SUPPORT FOR THE COLLEGE'S ACADEMIC, ATHLETIC AND STUDENT LIFE PROGRAMS BY SOLICITING AND OBTAINING FUNDS FOR THE FUTHERANCE OF THOSE PROGRAMS. THE COLLEGE'S TOTAL ENROLLMENT FOR THE YEAR WAS 2,099. OF THIS NUMBER, 82% OF THE STUDENTS AT THE UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA'S COLLEGE AT WISE WERE ELIGIBLE FOR SOME FORM OF FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE AND A HIGH PERCENTAGE OF STUDENTS HAVE NO FAMILY SUPPORT.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART VI, LIST OF UNUSUAL GRANTS:
Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: DESCRIPTION: ONE-TIME ESTATE GIFT DATE: 11/02/17 AMOUNT: 740514. DESCRIPTION: ONE-TIME ESTATE GIFT DATE: 12/12/16 AMOUNT: 540711.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AMOUNTS INVESTED IN THE ENDOWMENT FUND ARE TO BE USED BASED ON THE DONOR'S OR BOARD'S RESTRICTIONS TO FUND SUPPORT FOR THE UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA'S COLLEGE AT WISE, INCLUDING SCHOLARSHIPS, SCHOOL SUPPORT AND OPERATING EXPENSES.

THE FOUNDATION HAS REVIEWED AND EVALUATED THE RELEVANT TECHNICAL MERITS OF EACH OF ITS TAX POSITIONS IN ACCORDANCE WITH GUIDANCE ESTABLISHED BY THE FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING STANDARDS BOARD (FASB) AND DETERMINED THAT THERE ARE NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT WOULD HAVE A MATERIAL IMPACT ON THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS OF THE FOUNDATION.
SPECIAL EVENT EXPENSES OFFSET AGAINST SPECIAL EVENT INCOME LOSS ON VALUATION OF BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN CHARITABLE GIFT ANNUITY
SPECIAL EVENT EXPENSES OFFSET AGAINST SPECIAL EVENT INCOME

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA'S COLLEGE AT WISE

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: STUDENT SERVICES, OPERATING FUNDS, EQUIPMENT AND UNIFORMS

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.GrantTypeTxt: SCHOLARSHIPS AND AWARDS - THE SCHOLARSHIPS ARE BASED ON NEED AND MERIT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GRANTS AND OTHER ASSISTANCE TO GOVERNMENTS AND ORGANIZAIONS IN THE UNITED STATES: THE FOUNDATION GRANTS AMOUNTS DIRECTLY TO THE UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA'S COLLEGE AT WISE (THE UNIVERSITY). ALL FUNDS ARE USED DIRECTLY IN COMPLETING THE EDUCATIONAL PURPOSE OF THE UNIVERSITY. GRANTS AND OTHER ASSISTANCE TO INDIVIDUALS IN THE UNITED STATES: THE SCHOLARSHIPS AWARDED TO STUDENTS AT THE UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA'S COLLEGE AT WISE (THE UNIVERSITY) ARE BASED UPON NEED AND MERIT. THE SCHOLARHIPS AND AWARDS ARE TO BE USED TO SUPPORT THE RECIPIENTS WHILE ATTENDING THE UNIVERSITY IN FURTHERANCE OF THEIR EDUCATIONAL PURSUITS.
THE FOUNDATION REPORTS THE NUMBER OF CONTRIBUTIONS RATHER THAN THE NUMBER OF ITEMS RECEIVED.
THE FOUNDATION USES A LOCAL STOCK BROKER AS THEIR DESIGNATED THIRD PARTY TO RECEIVE AND LIQUIDATE DONATED SECURITIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MR. MARVIN W. GILLIAM, JR. AND MRS. MARCIA GILLIAM - FAMILY RELATIONSHIP.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE FOUNDATION'S FINANCE COMMITTEE UPON ITS COMPLETION. THE BOARD IS OFFERED A FINAL VERSION OF FORM 990 UPON ITS COMPLETION. THE FORM IS FILED AND MADE AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION BOTH AT THE FOUNDATION AND THROUGH THE UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA'S OFFICE OF PUBLIC RELATIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FOLLOWING APPOINTMENT TO OFFICE, DIRECTORS AND OFFICERS OF THE FOUNDATION SHALL BE INFORMED OF THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. ON AN ANNUAL BASIS, EACH DIRECTOR AND OFFICER SHALL CERTIFY IN WRITING TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS THAT, TO THE BEST OF HIS/HER KNOWLEDGE AND BELIEF, HE/SHE HAS ACTED IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR SHALL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR DISSEMINATION OF THE POLICY, THE COMPLETION OF THE ANNUAL CERTIFICATIONS, AND REPORTING NON-COMPLIANCE TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION'S FORM 1023 AND 990 ARE MADE AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION BOTH AT THE FOUNDATION AND THROUGH THE UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA'S OFFICE OF PUBLIC RELATIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS CAN BE DISTRIBUTED TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST. HOWEVER, REQUESTS ARE SUBJECT TO THE APPROVAL OF THE FOUNDATION'S BOARD AND THE FOUNDATION'S CONSIDERATION OF THE INTENDED USE OF THE REQUESTED DOCUMENTS. ALL SUCH REQUESTS ARE DIRECTED TO THE UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA AND THE OFFICE OF PUBLIC AFFAIRS.
LOSS ON VALUATION OF BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN CHARITABLE GIFT AGREEMENT -22,000.
THE FOUNDATION'S BOARD OF DIRECTORS IS RESPONSIBLE FOR SELECTION AND RETENTION OF INDEPENDENT AUDITORS. THIS PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: PART I, LINE 15 AND PART IX, LINE 7
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SALARIES AND BENEFITS PAID ON BEHALF OF THE UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA'S COLLEGE AT WISE HAVE BEEN SHOWN AS "OTHER SALARIES AND WAGES" FOR THE 2017 IRS FORM 990.

DirectControllingEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THE UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA'S COLLEGE AT WISE FOUNDATION
